name: AO3 - Direct Download Links
description: Makes the download book links direct

name: AO3 - Download Buttons
description: Adds a download button to each blurb on pages (not work pages)

name: AO3 - Keystrokes
description: Adds next/previous page/chapter/part and kudos keystrokes (next chapter/page - right arrow/Shift + N, previous chapter/page - left arrow/Shift + P, kudos - K)

name: AO3 - Series Download Links
description: Adds a button which opens a modal to download stories from series

name: Canvas LMS - Automatic Next Clicker
description: Clicks the next button on module pages (two second delay)

name: Canvas LMS - Keystrokes
description: Adds next page keystrokes when the next button is available (typically on modules) (next page - right arrow/Shift + N, previous page - left arrow/Shift + P)

name: FanFiction.Net - Keystrokes
description: Adds next chapter, previous chapter, and follow/favorite keystrokes (next chapter - right arrow/Shift + N, previous chapter - left arrow/Shift + P, follow/favorite - Shift + L)

name: FanFiction.Net - Mobile Redirect
description: Redirects users from the mobile version of FanFiction.Net to the desktop version

name: Gameinc.io - Automatic Money Generator
description: Continously generates money for the player

name: Merriam-Webster - Keystrokes
description: Adds a search focus keystroke (the slash key, /)

name: qBraid qBook - Keystrokes
description: Adds next and previous section keystrokes (next section - right arrow, previous section - left arrow)

name: XKCD - Keystrokes
description: Adds next, previous, and random comic keystrokes (next comic - Shift + N, previous comic - Shift + P, random comic - Shift + R)
